question: Analyze the IT technology adoption trends and partnerships of leading companies in the AI sector.

subtasks.task: Identify and retrieve the list of companies that are classified under the AI technology sector.
Gather information on the strategic technology focus areas related to AI for these companies.
Analyze the partnerships related to AI technology, focusing on deal values and partnership descriptions.
Compile social media engagement metrics to correlate public interaction with AI technology announcements and partnerships.
Summarize insights and trends observed from the technology adoption and partnership data for reporting.
